targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "$rp"."ping4" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "metric" = 'rta') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "ping4" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "metric" = 'pl') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "$rp"."snmp" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "service" =~ /^*.CPU.*/ AND "metric" =~ /^.*RE.*$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "metric" fill(previous)

SELECT max("value") FROM "$rp"."snmp" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "service" =~ /^Juniper.*.Memory.*/ AND "metric" =~ /^.*RE.*$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "metric" fill(0)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "snmp" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "metric" = 'CPU RE0' AND "service" = 'Juniper CPU ACX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "snmp" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "metric" = 'CPU RE0' AND "service" = 'Juniper CPU ACX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname"
SELECT mean("value") FROM "snmp" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "metric" = 'CPU RE0' AND "service" = 'Juniper CPU ACX') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval), "hostname"

SELECT mean("value") FROM "autogen"."Interface-check-command" WHERE ("hostname" =~ /^$hostname$/ AND "metric" = 'in_bits' AND "service" =~ /^IfCheck-[[interface]]$/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(previous)

list.definition: SELECT hosts.display_name FROM ${datasource:csv} WHERE state ~ (${hoststate:pipe}) AND groups ~ (${hostgroup:pipe}) AND vars.device_type = ${device_type:pipe};
list.label: Device name
list.name: hostname
list.query: SELECT hosts.display_name FROM ${datasource:csv} WHERE state ~ (${hoststate:pipe}) AND groups ~ (${hostgroup:pipe}) AND vars.device_type = ${device_type:pipe};

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES from hostalive  WITH KEY = "address" where device_type =~ /$device_type/  and hostname =~ /$hostname/
list.label: IP address
list.name: address
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES from hostalive  WITH KEY = "address" where device_type =~ /$device_type/  and hostname =~ /$hostname/

list.definition: SHOW TAG VALUES from /Interface-check-command/ WITH KEY = "service" where hostname =~ /$hostname/
list.label: Interface-check
list.name: interface
list.query: SHOW TAG VALUES from /Interface-check-command/ WITH KEY = "service" where hostname =~ /$hostname/

list.definition: select rp from forever.rp_config where  ($__to - $__from > "start") and ($__to - $__from <= "end")
list.name: rp
list.query: select rp from forever.rp_config where  ($__to - $__from > "start") and ($__to - $__from <= "end")
